attributes.action: Add Rottweilers to Dangerous Dogs Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The dangerous dogs Act 1991 states 
'to enable restrictions to be imposed in relation to other types of dog which present a serious danger to the public;' 

The Rottweiler breed presents a serious danger to the public, especially to young children and should be included on the Dangerous Dog Act. 
It is to easy to blame the owners. Rottweilers are naturally aggressive and vicious. Cadey Lee Deacon and Archie Lee Hirst never had the chance to grow up, how many more children must die before these dogs are added to the Dangerous Dogs Act.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
